resources.string: Renshuu Widget is a companion app to renshuu.org, a language learning platform. It allows you to see your dashboard progress on your home screen.
To function, this app needs an API key from renshuu.org
The API Key can be found under the experimental panel of renshuu\'s settings (tap menu, then the settings icon, then search for \"api\")

The widget is not updating? You may need to exclude the app from battery optimization or enable autostart.

Check the following app's settings:
1. Settings->Battery & perfomance -> App battery saver -> Select Renshuu Widget -> No restrictions
2. Settings -> Apps -> Permissions -> Autostart -> Add Renshuu Widget to autostart
Do you want to contribute to the project? Click here!
